Class Description: The method `testRemoveChar()` is a test function that checks the functionality of the `remove()` method from the `Utils` class. It tests if the `remove()` method correctly removes a specified character from a given string.
Return Value Description: The method does not return any value.
Return Type: The method is of type void.

Class Description: The `createFineTuningJob` method is part of the `OpenAiApi` interface. This method is used to create a fine-tuning job.

Parameters.param_description: The request for creating a fine-tuning job.

Return Value Description: This method returns a `Single` object that wraps the `FineTuningJob` object. This `FineTuningJob` object represents the fine-tuning job that has been created.

json.param_description: The request for creating a fine-tuning job.

Class Description: The `createImageEdit` method is a part of the `OpenAiApi` interface. This method is used to create an image edit in the OpenAI system.

Parameters.param_description: The request body containing the details for the image edit.

Return Value Description: The method returns an instance of `Single<ImageResult>`. This represents the result of the image edit creation operation.

json.param_description: The request body containing the details for the image edit.

Class Description: The `deleteFile` method in the `OpenAiApi` interface is used to delete a specific file in the OpenAI system.

Parameters.param_description: The unique identifier of the file to be deleted.

Return Value Description: This method returns a `Single` observable containing the result of the delete operation. If the operation is successful, the `DeleteResult` object will contain the details of the deletion.

json.param_description: The unique identifier of the file to be deleted.

Class Description: The `listFineTunes` method is part of the `OpenAiApi` interface. This method is used to list all the fine-tuning results. Note that this method is deprecated, which means it is not recommended for use in new code.
Return Value Description: This method returns a `Single` reactive type that emits an `OpenAiResponse` object containing a list of `FineTuneResult` objects. Each `FineTuneResult` object represents the result of a fine-tuning operation.

Class Description: The `uploadFile` method is part of the `OpenAiApi` interface in the `com.theokanning.openai.client` package. This method is used to upload a file to the OpenAI API. The file is sent as a multipart body part, along with a request body that specifies the purpose of the file.

Parameters.param_description: The purpose of the file being uploaded.
The file to be uploaded.

Return Value Description: This method returns a `Single` object that emits the `File` object once the file has been uploaded successfully.

json.param_description: The purpose of the file being uploaded.
The file to be uploaded.

Class Description: The `createCompletion` method is part of the `OpenAiApi` interface. It is responsible for creating a completion using the OpenAI API. A completion in this context refers to the output generated by the OpenAI model based on the provided input.

Parameters.param_description: The request object that contains the parameters for the completion creation.

Return Value Description: The method returns a `Single` object that wraps the `CompletionResult` object. The `CompletionResult` object contains the result of the completion creation.

json.param_description: The request object that contains the parameters for the completion creation.

Class Description: The `createImage` method is part of the `OpenAiApi` interface. This method is used to create an image using the OpenAI API.

Parameters.param_description: The request object containing the details needed to create an image.

Return Value Description: This method returns the result of the image creation operation.

json.param_description: The request object containing the details needed to create an image.

Class Description: The `getEngines` method is a part of the `OpenAiApi` interface. This method is used to retrieve the list of available engines from the OpenAI API. However, this method has been marked as deprecated, which means it is no longer recommended for use, typically because it has been superseded by a newer method or is no longer being updated.
Return Value Description: This method returns a `Single` reactive type that emits an `OpenAiResponse` object containing a list of `Engine` objects. Each `Engine` object represents an engine available in the OpenAI API.

Class Description: The `retrieveFile` method is part of the `OpenAiApi` interface within the `com.theokanning.openai.client` package. This method is used to retrieve a specific file from the OpenAI server.

Return Value Description: This method returns a `Single` object that contains the file retrieved from the OpenAI server.

Class Description: The `retrieveFileContent` method is part of the `OpenAiApi` interface. This method is used to retrieve the content of a file from the OpenAI API.

Parameters.param_description: The unique identifier of the file whose content is to be retrieved.

Return Value Description: This method returns the content of the file identified by the provided `file_id`. The content is returned as a `Single` reactive stream of `ResponseBody`.

json.param_description: The unique identifier of the file whose content is to be retrieved.

Class Description: The `retrieveFineTuningJob` method is part of the `OpenAiApi` interface. This method retrieves the details of a specific fine-tuning job from the OpenAI API.

Return Value Description: This method returns a `Single` object that contains the details of the fine-tuning job.

Class Description: The `AuthenticationInterceptor` class is an implementation of the OkHttp `Interceptor` interface. It is used to add an authorization token header to a HTTP request.

Class Description: The `createFineTuneCompletion` method is part of the `OpenAiApi` interface. It is used to create a fine-tuned completion using the OpenAI API. This method sends a POST request to the OpenAI API with a `CompletionRequest` object.

Class Description: The `createTranslation` method is part of the `OpenAiApi` interface. This method is used to create a translation request in the OpenAI API.

Class Description: The method `retrieveFineTuningJob` is a part of the `OpenAiApi` interface in the `com.theokanning.openai.client` package. This method is used to retrieve a fine-tuning job from the OpenAI API using the provided fine-tuning job id.

Return Value Description: This method returns a `Single` object that emits the result of the chat completion request. The result includes the generated chat message.

Class Description: The method `subscription` is a part of the `OpenAiApi` interface and is used to inquire about account information. It provides details such as the total amount (in US dollars) and other related information.
